summary: Provides an asynchronous WebSocket client for the HollaEx exchange, managing connection lifecycle, message routing, error handling, and keep‑alive pings while exposing subscription methods for live market data (order books, trades) and private account streams (balances, orders).
business_intent: Enables developers and traders to integrate real‑time HollaEx market and account information into automated trading systems, monitoring tools, and portfolio management applications.
